All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActivityBearImageListBinding
 
ActivityMainBinding
 
ActivityTriviaMainBinding
 
AppDatabase
This class serves as the main access point for the underlying SQLite database.
BearApplication
The BearApplication class represents the main activity for the Bear Images application.
BearEntryBinding
 
BearEntryDetailsBinding
 
BearImage
Entity class represents a bear image entity in the BearImages application.
BearImageDao
The BearImageDao interface defines the Data Access Object (DAO) for the BearImage entity in the BearImages application.
BearImageDatabase
The BearImageDatabase class represents the Room database for the BearImages application.
BearImageDetailsFragment
The BearImageDetailsFragment class represents a fragment that displays details of a selected bear image.
BearImageViewModel
The BearImageViewModel class represents the ViewModel for the BearImages application.
BuildConfig
 
ConversionAdapter
The ConversionAdapter class is a custom RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of currency conversions.
ConversionAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface to handle regular click events on the conversion items.
ConversionAdapter.OnLongClickListener
Interface to handle long click events on the conversion items.
ConversionAdapterBinding
 
ConversionDAO
The ConversionDAO class represents a data object for currency conversions.
ConversionDB
Database helper class for managing the conversions table.
ConversionDetailFragment
A fragment that displays the details of a currency conversion.
ConversionMain
The ConversionMain activity handles the currency conversion process, displaying conversion results in a RecyclerView, and managing user interactions with the app.
ConversionMainBinding
 
ConversionViewModel
The ConversionViewModel class is a ViewModel that holds and manages data related to currency conversions.
DetailsLayoutBinding
 
Flight
Represents a flight with various attributes such as departure airport, flight number, delay, terminal, gate, and destination.
FlightAdapter
RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a list of Flight items in a RecyclerView.
FlightAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface for handling item click events in the RecyclerView.
FlightDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for managing Flight entities in the database.
FlightDatabase
FlightDatabase is an abstract class that extends RoomDatabase and serves as the main access point to the underlying SQLite database for managing Flight entities.
FlightDetailFragment
A Fragment class representing the Flight Detail screen, where users can view and edit the details of a selected flight.
FlightDetailInfoBinding
 
FlightListBinding
 
FLightListViewModel
ViewModel class for managing flight-related data in the Flight List screen.
FlightLoginBinding
 
FlightMainActivity
Main activity for the Flight Tracker app.
FlightMainBinding
 
FragmentHighScoresBinding
 
HighScoresFragment
The HighScoresFragment class is a Fragment that displays a list of high scores from the local database in a ListView.
HighScoresViewModel
The HighScoresViewModel class is an AndroidViewModel that acts as an interface between the HighScoresFragment and the data layer of the app, represented by the UserScoreDAO and AppDatabase.
MainActivity
The MainActivity class represents the main entry point of the CST2335 Final Project application.
TriviaApplication
The TriviaApplication class extends AppCompatActivity and manages the game logic and UI interactions for the trivia application.
TriviaMain
The TriviaMain class is an Activity that serves as the main entry point of the trivia game.
TriviaQuestion
The TriviaQuestion class represents a trivia question.
TriviaUserDetailsBinding
 
UserScore
The UserScore class represents a user's score in the trivia game.
UserScoreDAO
The UserScoreDAO interface defines the operations that can be performed on the UserScore table in the Room database.
